name: Lone City
description:
Welcome to Lone City!

Your city's ever-growing population causes significant problems. Construct a variety of buildings to earn money and keep your population in control. However, you must beware of the pollution your buildings cause or else climate change will create major destruction to the city. Build environmentally friendly structures to combat pollution. Nevertheless, your city does not have an unlimited expanse... be efficient with your space to survive. Do you have the skill to build your way to survival before your city runs to meets its end?

Credits:

Programming & 3D Modeling: Mootbing, BotMoooo

Music and SFX: Mootbing, BotMoooo, Elektrium

Bad British accent courtesy of Mootbing

This game was made for the 2021 Epic MegaJam with the theme of "Running Out of Space"

Thanks to Epic Games for hosting the jam!
